Secure drainage tube.sentence: The nurse gathers the necessary tools including the drainage tube, sterile gloves, and adhesive tape.
Secure drainage tube.subject: The nurse
Secure drainage tube.tools: drainage tube, sterile gloves, adhesive tape

Secure drainage tube.sentence: The nurse puts on sterile gloves to maintain a sterile environment.
Secure drainage tube.subject: The nurse

Secure drainage tube.sentence: The nurse carefully inserts the drainage tube into the appropriate anatomical site.
Secure drainage tube.subject: The nurse

Secure drainage tube.sentence: The nurse secures the drainage tube in place using adhesive tape.
Secure drainage tube.subject: The nurse

Secure drainage tube.sentence: The nurse checks the drainage system for proper function and leaks after securing the tube.
Secure drainage tube.subject: The nurse
